channel.title: ProjectX || The Ultimate Reality
channel.description:
[center][b]Introduction[/b] [i]Hello, my name is Jack. I'm known as [URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=560587]Skyro[/URL] on here. I've been around Runescape Private Servers for around about 3 years. I wouldn't say I'm the best coder, I'm not that great to be honest. This is going to be a massive learning curve for me and is going to help me to learn a lot about programming and a lot about the language of Java. I'm lucky that I'm starting off to work with my 2 really close friends; [URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=498197]Whackatre[/URL] and [URL=http://projectrainbow.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=11808]Skyru[/URL]. I've only known [URL=http://http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=534060]Ruby Forums Coder[/URL] for about 2 weeks, he is a cool guy and will be our website developer, we are making our project from a Project Insanity base with a twist. We're going to be re-writing every class and re-writing the game engine completely. We will be adding a better and different networking system but we're still deciding what to use.[/i]
[b]Server Programmers[/b] [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111123045826/runescape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img] Skyro [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111123045826/runescape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img] Time [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111123045826/runescape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img] Onix [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111123045826/runescape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img] Whackatre
[b]Website Developer[/b] [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111123045826/runescape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img] Ruby Forums Coder
[b]Progress[/b] [i]N/A[/i]
[b]Media[/b] [i]N/A[/i][/center]

item.title: ProjectX || The Ultimate Reality
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:35, topic:443392”][quote author=TimeRS3 link=topic=546077.msg4007754#msg4007754 date=1338838933]

i have it in my mind cause earlier he told me he liked my higher revision work so idk if he will be willing to work with that

I have heard of your higher revision work, heard its good. So I guess you could try it… The number of players that play 508+ revisions is slim though…

well somewhat rite its cause most people dont know how to use new java or get it takes lots explaining if they dont listen infact i have over 100 players atm cause i make sure that when the playnow button is clicked your directed to jre7 and the jdk if you are using lower version makes life so much easier for both
[/quote]
I didn’t understand a thing you just said…[/quote]

XD i feel retarded now lol just trying to say 508+ get just as much players if there handled well

Read full topic

item.title: ProjectX || The Ultimate Reality
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Ruby Forums Coder, post:32, topic:443392”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=546077.msg4006467#msg4006467 date=1338687319]
You did in fact hack the forums ruby. I never said you were going to do it again, I just said its a good thing to keep in mind.

Good luck with the project.
[/quote]

No I never, you retard.

I’ve explained to Love and Tiny that it wasn’t me. I was in Dubai at the time, without any technology to access the internet on me. I was packed up in a shipping container with a special task force, so don’t start telling me what I did and didn’t do.

All my passwords were compromised by a dump done on Prothieum’s passwords, I dunno who done it, by my password for the free-coding and prothieum were the same, so there’s your fucking answer you idiot.[/quote] keep telling yourself that. Special ops my ass

Read full topic

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

We don’t know how to fix it.

item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

TimeRS3:

i have it in my mind cause earlier he told me he liked my higher revision work so idk if he will be willing to work with that

I have heard of your higher revision work, heard its good. So I guess you could try it… The number of players that play 508+ revisions is slim though…

Whackatre:

Skyro’s point was that “Pi is messy as shit, there’s so much to clean up”, does anybody have any evidence and explanation to back up that statement?

Yes I do, there is a lot wrong, most of the released PI’s were done by retards, so you pretty much just wanna delete everything… And the clean one with just Sanity messing it up, is pretty bad, if you have ever checked the server in the visual vm, its horrible…

Read full topic

Not to mention that the SS source isn’t compatible with most clients, yesterday was a complete waste of my time configuring the client.
